name: Batch Image Resizer
description: Resize all images in a folder to specified dimensions with batch processing capabilities
author: ScriptHub

parameters.name: folder_path
parameters.label: Folder Path
parameters.description: Path to the folder containing images to resize

parameters.name: height
parameters.label: Height (pixels)
parameters.placeholder: If not provided, height will be adjusted to maintain aspect ratio

parameters.name: save_option
parameters.label: Save Option
parameters.description: Choose how to save the resized images

longDescription: A script to batch resize all images in a specified folder to given dimensions. Supports various image formats and allows saving resized images in the same folder with a suffix or in a new folder. You can also set the JPEG quality for output images.
